String.string: You're ready to enter the Blacksmith's Workshop.
Look for a {@LinkCreature:79#1501#teleportal} to enter the Blacksmith's Workshop.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:411#7000#Goddess Kaia} in Muhrak's Workshop in Habere. [Use the {@LinkCreature:79#1501#Teleportal} to enter the Blacksmith's Workshop.]
Speak with {@LinkCreature:411#5017#Fovarth} in the Blacksmith's Workshop in Habere. [Use the {@LinkCreature:79#1501#Teleportal} to enter the Blacksmith's Workshop.]
